attributes.action: Publish IN FULL every item of expenditure, by whom, on EVERY Government held credit card ever held
attributes.additional_details: There is obviously fraud on a massive scale being perpetrated against the taxpayer by government officials - AGAIN - following on from the massive fraud perpetrated by the cohort of fraudsters known as Honourable Members of Parliament.  The taxpayer has the right to know what is being spent on what - if that is not the case then the taxpayer MUST be given the right NOT TO PAY TAXES.
